name: Off-Road Virtual Reality Game: VR Game For Google Cardboard
name_original: Off-Road Virtual Reality Game: VR Game For Google Cardboard
description:
Health and Safety Warning!
Remain stationary when using this Virtual Reality Application. If you experience any discomfort or health reaction stop using the Application. Ensure you have read "Health and Safety Warnings" document provided below before using this Application.
http://wenklystudio.com/legal/Warnings/VrHealthWarning.pdf
----

Feel the real adventure of extreme 4x4 Off-road driving.
Explore stunning environment of sunny mountains.

You don't need controller to enjoy this ride. Just bent sideways and the car will automatically turn with your body movement.

We did not forgot to add some extreme obstacles and crazy jumps to make your extreme virtual reality experience even more entertaining.

Credits:
http://wenklystudio.com/Legal/Credits/VROffroad.html
